data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Describe a time that you made a big decision and imagine what would have happened if you had chosen differently. Include specific details."
data.answer: If I were asked about a major decision that I have made recently, I would tell you the following story. It was last year's winter, when one of my best friends, William, asked me if I would like to go skiing with him and a group of his friends, I didn't give him my answer straight away. Instead, I had a thorough thought over that plan for a couple of days because I had never been skiing before, and I hardly knew any of the other people in the group. Finally, I made my mind – I decided to join them and leave all the concerns behind. I suppose the most significant driver was the will to try playing extreme sports. The trip actually went smoothly, and I made many new friends along the way. If for any reason, I had chosen otherwise, I suppose that I would regret it so much once William came back from the snow mountain and showed me all the pictures and video clips he had shot when skiing. This is because I have actually experienced the great fun of skiing and viewed the amazingly gorgeous scenery of the snow mountain. Besides, I wouldn’t have met so many amazing people who have taken good care of me and taught me how to ski. （219 字）
